other_tests.findings: The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass. Main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CBD measures 5 mm. Several gallstones are noted within the gallbladder. The gallbladder is otherwise thin walled and unremarkable. The imaged portion of the pancreas appears mildly enlarged in comparison to a prior study.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The CBD previously measured 4 mm and is now 5 mm. The pancreas is noted to be mildly enlarged in comparison to a prior study.
